contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 10, 2009 D West Wales BBA Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - Huw Davies (euphonium) Ynyshir. Prizes - 1st £180, 2nd £125, 3rd £110. 6 bands competed.
Oct. 12, 2009, 4:59 p.m. July 4, 2020, 10:10 a.m.
1 Ynyshir Band Dean Evans Oceans
2 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter A Scots Miscellany
3 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden A Gallimaufry Suite
4 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Glyn Rhys Davies Variations on Laudate Dominum
5 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Colin Hogg Dimensions
6 Lewis Merthyr Band Gareth Pritchard Symphonic Suite
